commit message:
-switch activity launchmode back to singleTask (was breaking voice transcription)
-add support for sms's from email gateways (not sure about replies and quick replies working correctly, no way to test right now)
-turn off blur for Eclair devices (something is causing them to run super slow
-fix up dismissing loading dialog for TTS
